file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.1.0
info:
  title: Oshavery API
  version: '0.2'
  summary: Oshavery API ver. 0.2です
  description: ''
  license:
    identifier: AGPL-3.0-or-later
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:3000'
paths:
  /login:
    post:
      summary: ログイン
      tags:
        - auth
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ログイン成功
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: ''
                type: object
                properties:
                  token:
                    type: string
                required:
                  - token
                x-examples:
                  example-1:
                    token: ''
        '401':
          description: 認証情報が間違っています
        '403':
          description: ログイン対象のユーザーアカウントに問題があります.
      operationId: post-login
      description: ログインします
      security: []
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              description: ''
              type: object
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                password:
                  type: string
                  minLength: 1
              required:
                - name
                - password
              x-examples:
                example-1:
                  name: ''
                  password: 1m
    delete:
      summary: ログアウト
      tags:
        - auth
      responses:
        '204':
          description: ログアウトしました
      operationId: delete-login
      description: ログアウト
      security:
        - 'API Key ': []
  '/users/{user_id}':
    parameters:
      - schema:
          type: string
        name: user_id
        in: path
        required: true
        description: ユーザーID
    get:
      summary: 特定ユーザーのユーザー情報を取得
      tags:
        - user
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: ''
                type: object
                x-examples:
                  example-1:
                    id: ''
                    name: ''
                    icon: ''
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                  name:
                    type: string
                  suspended:
                    type: string
                  profile:
                    type: object
                    required:
                      - status
                      - ststus_message
                      - icon
                    properties:
                      status:
                        type: string
                      ststus_message:
                        type: string
                      icon:
                        type: string
                  created_at:
                    type: string
                  updated_at:
                    type: string
                required:
                  - id
                  - name
                  - suspended
                  - profile
              examples: {}
      operationId: get-users-user_id
      description: ''
      security:
        - API Key　: []
      parameters: []
  /users/@me:
    get:
      summary: 自分のユーザー情報を取得
      tags:
        - user
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: ''
                type: object
                x-examples:
                  example-1:
                    id: string
                    name: string
                    suspended: string
                    profile:
                      status: string
                      ststus_message: string
                      icon: string
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  name:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  suspended:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  profile:
                    type: object
                    required:
                      - status
                      - ststus_message
                      - icon
                    properties:
                      status:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      ststus_message:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      icon:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                required:
                  - id
                  - name
                  - suspended
                  - profile
              examples:
                example-1:
                  id: string
                  name: string
                  suspended: string
                  profile:
                    status: string
                    ststus_message: string
                    icon: string
      operationId: get-users-me
      security:
        - API Key　: []
    patch:
      summary: 自分のユーザー情報を更新
      tags:
        - user
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: ''
                type: object
                x-examples:
                  example-1:
                    id: string
                    name: string
                    suspended: string
                    profile:
                      status: string
                      ststus_message: string
                      icon: string
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  name:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  suspended:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  profile:
                    type: object
                    required:
                      - status
                      - ststus_message
                      - icon
                    properties:
                      status:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      ststus_message:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      icon:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                  created_at:
                    type: string
                  updated_at:
                    type: string
                required:
                  - id
                  - name
                  - suspended
                  - profile
      operationId: patch-users-me
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              description: ''
              type: object
              x-examples:
                example-1:
                  name: string
                  password: string
                  profile:
                    status: ''
                    status_message: ''
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                  minLength: 1
                password:
                  type: string
                  minLength: 1
                profile:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    status:
                      type: string
                    status_message:
                      type: string
            examples: {}
      security:
        - API Key　: []
  /:
    get:
      summary: インスタンスコンフィギュレーション表示
      tags: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: ''
                type: object
                properties:
                  version:
                    type: string
                  ws:
                    type: string
                  app:
                    type: string
                required:
                  - version
                  - ws
                  - app
                x-examples:
                  example-1:
                    version: ''
                    ws: ''
                    app: ''
      operationId: get
      description: ''
  '/guilds/{guild_id}':
    parameters:
      - schema:
          type: string
        name: guild_id
        in: path
        required: true
    get:
      summary: ギルドを取得
      tags:
        - guild
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                  name:
                    type: string
                  icon:
                    type: string
                  created_at:
                    type: string
                  channels:
                    type: object
                    required:
                      - id
                      - topic
                      - name
                      - created_at
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                      topic:
                        type: string
                      name:
                        type: string
                      created_at:
                        type: string
                required:
                  - id
                  - name
                  - icon
                  - created_at
                  - channels
              examples: {}
      operationId: get-guilds-guild_id
      security:
        - API Key　: []
    patch:
      summary: ギルドを編集
      tags:
        - guild
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: ''
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  name:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  icon:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  created_at:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  channels:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      topic:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      name:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      created_at:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                    required:
                      - id
                      - topic
                      - name
                      - created_at
                required:
                  - id
                  - name
                  - icon
                  - created_at
                  - channels
                x-examples:
                  example-1:
                    id: string
                    name: string
                    icon: string
                    created_at: string
                    channels:
                      id: string
                      topic: string
                      name: string
                      created_at: string
      operationId: patch-guilds-guild_id
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              description: ''
              type: object
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                  minLength: 1
              required:
                - name
              x-examples:
                example-1:
                  name: string
      security:
        - API Key　: []
  '/channels/{id}':
    parameters:
      - schema:
          type: string
        name: id
        in: path
        required: true
    get:
      summary: チャンネルを取得
      tags:
        - channel
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: ''
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                  topic:
                    type: string
                  name:
                    type: string
                  created_at:
                    type: string
                required:
                  - id
                  - topic
                  - name
                  - created_at
                x-examples:
                  example-1:
                    id: ''
                    topic: ''
                    name: ''
                    created_at: ''
        '':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: ''
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                  topic:
                    type: string
                  name:
                    type: string
                required:
                  - id
                  - topic
                  - name
                x-examples:
                  example-1:
                    id: ''
                    topic: ''
                    name: ''
      operationId: get-channels-id
  '/channels/{channel_id}/messages':
    parameters:
      - schema:
          type: string
        name: channel_id
        in: path
        required: true
    get:
      summary: メッセージの取得
      tags:
        - message
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: ''
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  content:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  author:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      name:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                    required:
                      - id
                      - name
                  posted_at:
                    type: string
                  edited_at:
                    type: string
                required:
                  - id
                  - content
                  - author
                  - posted_at
                  - edited_at
                x-examples:
                  example-1:
                    id: string
                    content: string
                    author:
                      id: string
                      name: string
                    posted_at: ''
                    edited_at: ''
              examples: {}
      operationId: get-channels-channel_id-messages
      description: ''
      security:
        - API Key　: []
    post:
      summary: メッセージの投稿
      tags:
        - message
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: ''
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  content:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  author:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      name:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                    required:
                      - id
                      - name
                  posted_at:
                    type: string
                  edited_at:
                    type: string
                required:
                  - id
                  - content
                  - author
                  - posted_at
                  - edited_at
                x-examples:
                  example-1:
                    id: string
                    content: string
                    author:
                      id: string
                      name: string
                    posted_at: ''
                    edited_at: ''
      operationId: post-channels-channel_id-messages
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              description: ''
              type: object
              properties:
                content:
                  type: string
              required:
                - content
              x-examples:
                example-1:
                  content: ''
      security:
        - API Key　: []
  '/channels/{channel_id}/messages/{message_id}':
    parameters:
      - schema:
          type: string
        name: channel_id
        in: path
        required: true
      - schema:
          type: string
        name: message_id
        in: path
        required: true
    get:
      summary: メッセージを1件取得
      tags:
        - message
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: ''
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  content:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  author:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      name:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                    required:
                      - id
                      - name
                  posted_at:
                    type: string
                  edited_at:
                    type: string
                required:
                  - id
                  - content
                  - author
                  - posted_at
                  - edited_at
                x-examples:
                  example-1:
                    id: string
                    content: string
                    author:
                      id: string
                      name: string
                    posted_at: ''
                    edited_at: ''
      operationId: get-channels-channel_id-messages-message_id
      security:
        - API Key　: []
    patch:
      summary: メッセージを更新
      tags:
        - message
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: ''
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  content:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  author:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      name:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                    required:
                      - id
                      - name
                  posted_at:
                    type: string
                  edited_at:
                    type: string
                required:
                  - id
                  - content
                  - author
                  - posted_at
                  - edited_at
                x-examples:
                  example-1:
                    id: string
                    content: string
                    author:
                      id: string
                      name: string
                    posted_at: ''
                    edited_at: ''
      operationId: patch-channels-channel_id-messages-message_id
      security:
        - API Key　: []
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              description: ''
              type: object
              properties:
                content:
                  type: string
              required:
                - content
              x-examples:
                example-1:
                  content: ''
    delete:
      summary: メッセージを削除
      tags:
        - message
      responses:
        '204':
          description: No Content
      operationId: delete-channels-channel_id-messages-message_id
      security:
        - API Key　: []
  /users/@me/icon:
    post:
      summary: アイコンをアップロード
      tags:
        - user
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
      operationId: post-users-@me-icon
      description: ''
      security:
        - API Key　: []
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties: {}
        description: '`file`: 画像ファイル'
    put:
      summary: アイコンを変更
      tags:
        - user
      responses: {}
      operationId: put-users-@me-icon
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties: {}
        description: '`file`: アイコン'
components:
  schemas: {}
  securitySchemes:
    API Key　:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
security:
  - 'API Key ': []

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /: get: operation "get": security: unknown security schema "API Key "
